name: zfrep3cl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0
body: |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0)))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))

|- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0)))))
-| wnfc(s2, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: An inference based on the Axiom of Replacement. Typically, ` ph ` defines a function from ` x ` to ` y ` . (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)
